title: Beef meatloaf
ingredients: ['2 1/2 stale bread rolls', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 teaspoon herbs de Provence', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika', 'salt and pepper', '500g minced beef', '2 eggs', 'butter as needed']
